Summary: Oval shape or saucer with emmiting lights.
divs: Sighting DetailsI looked up with my binoculars, WOW! first time I've seen one sooo close with binoculars. Massive, was also seen by Mexican Officials and Airlines during the same time span. Been UFO watcher for years, but this is my first encounter up so close!
trends: There have been 21 other sightings in Laredo
There were no other sightings in Laredo on or around October 24th 2011
